data.title: How to Submit a Request for Mutilated Currency Examination
data.text:
BEP is accepting in-person deliveries of mutilated currency at the Washington, DC facility, only.

All in-person and mailed/shipped mutilated currency deliveries must include a fully completed and signed BEP Form 5283 with the submission.

Mutilated Currency in-person delivery and shipping address:

Bureau of Engraving and Printing

Mutilated Currency Division, Room 344A

14th and C Streets, SW

Washington, DC 20228

In-person delivery instructions: In-person deliveries should be made at BEPâ€™s Annex building visitor entrance on 14th Street, SW (on the Department of Agriculture side of 14th street). On arrival, please check in at the security station.

Drop-offs are accepted between 8:00 a.m. - 11:30 a.m. and 12:30 p.m. - 2:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, excluding federal holidays and other institution closings.

Form 5283 Instructions

Privacy Act Statement Please read before submitting BEP Form 5283.

Certification Statement Please read before submitting BEP Form 5283.

By clicking the button below you will be leaving BEP's website. In order to successfully submit the form you must go through all pages and receive a Record Locating Number.
